content: long to do the chain that acts like a cord to hang the book nook i recommend checking where you want to place it and how much lower than the hook you want the nook to fall i chained 51 chain giving me a distance of 20 cm between the hook/nail and the book nook chain 51 slip_stitch in the first st at the opposite side of the dowel fasten_off to add strength to the attachment just add a few stitches using a threading needle weave in your ends tide the straps around the dowel at the side of the stitches along the dowel and enjoy your cobbles & vines book nook show me your amazing creation tagging me on instagram at @o_layarn or emailing me at lolla olayarn@gmail com if you enjoyed crocheting this book nook check out the other patterns that are in my shop and on my blog and follow me on instagram at @o_layarn to keep updated with my new patterns 7 tester gallery crocheter @rism handmade yarn acrylic dk yarn crocheter @tex_lex18 yarn loops and thread silky soft crocheter @ashtenstitches yarn i love this yarn crocheter @enjaycrochets yarn bernat acrylic 8 crocheter @alexisxstitch yarn dk yarn crocheter @bxnksiesmakes yarn lion brand pound of love+caron blossom cakes crocheter @liz arts n crafts yarn red heart super saver acrylic 9
